stimulus:
In this experiment, you will be presented with 8 scenarios, which you must read carefully.

After reading each scenario, you will be prompted two comprehension questions: a multiple choice question and a brief open answer question. You will be required to answer both questions for every scenario, meaning 16 questions in total.

To begin the experiment, hit the space bar.

response.Explanation: I would think although she is annoyed that she has copied her, it's her best friend and so she wants her friend to be happy and maybe also sees it as a compliment.
I think it is obvious Catherine is pleased with her progress and that she is ust being mega enthusiastic after overcoming her challenges.
I would think, even if Anastasia thought it was disgusting, she was probably extremely grateful for the gesture.
As most people have said her dog is cute, I think she would think she was being sarcastic, well sarcastically humerous maybe.
I think it would've been apparent that Phillip had a distaste for the jacket, especially with the mumbled scoff, so I think Eric would probably see it as sarcastic.
He'd just seen them arguing and probably assumed they don't get along very well, so he might well think he is being sarcastic.
As Ken hasn't spoken to her since the break up, he will probably not know that they have remained friends and therefore assume she is being sarcastic.
She has no reason to doubt it, and although it is short and in no way, elaborate, I don't feel she would have reason to think it was anything but sincere.
